jcr:content.jcr:description: Altra partnered with Trail Sisters in April to celebrate Earth Day. Our goal was a collective 2,021 hours of trail clean-up by the end of the month.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra x Trail Sisters Earth Month Partnership

image.alt: Altra x Trail Sister logos over an image of two women doing trail cleanup

text.text: TAKE STEPS TOWARD A CLEANER EARTH

text_160822950.text: Join us in celebrating Earth Month

text.text:
DOING OUR PART FOR THE PLANET. 

Clean trails? More trees? Yes, please.  

As runners, the earth is our sanctuary. It allows us to escape, to explore, and to experience beautiful new places. We enjoy everything our planet gives to us, and we’re always looking to give back. 

That’s why we’ve partnered with Trail Sisters for the month of April. Together, we’re asking you to get outside and help clean up the trails you love. Our goal is to reach or exceed 2,021 hours of trail clean-up by the end of April.

customhtml2.customHTML: Sign up and submit your hours at Trail Sisters and we’ll give you a 15% off code for AltraRunning.com.

text.text: We’re not stopping there. We’re asking you to share the love, and we’ll return the favor!

customhtml2.customHTML: Post your trail clean-up photos with the hashtag #AltraCleanPlanetPromo, and for every post shared up to 5,000, we’ll plant a tree in partnership with One Tree Planted.

image.alt: 4-part picture of people cleaning up their local trails

text.text: *Altra to plant a tree for every qualifying hashtag posted in April '21, up to 5,000. Must be 18+. Hashtag is international. One post per person. Instagram account required. Consumer will not receive any compensation/benefit for posting. Follow all laws and respect 3rd party rights as to clean-up. By posting photo, you grant Altra Running rights to photo. Subject to Terms & Altra Privacy Statement. 15% off offer is US only. Discount is pre-tax and excludes shipping. Not to be combined with any other offer. Limit one per person. One-time use only. Subject to expiration date.
